tool.name: GenerateMap

param.name: year_to_generate
param.dialogReference: Select the year that you want to include data from

param.name: month_to_generate
param.expression: January | February | March | April | May | June | July | August | September | October | November | December
param.dialogReference: Select the month within the year chosen in the previous option that you want to filter the data to.

param.name: symbology
param.expression: CHL | Corrected CHL | Dissolved Oxygen | DO Percent Saturation | pH | RPAR | Salinity | SpCond | Temperature | Turbidity
param.dialogReference: Choose the parameter that you want to symbolize the data in the output layer by. All parameters will be available in the data that's returned, but it will only be symbolized by a single attribute.

param.name: output_map
param.dialogReference: Where should the output map be placed. In ArcMap, this should be the full path to a new map document. In ArcGIS Pro, this should just be the name to give the new map in this project.

param.name: output_pdf
param.dialogReference: This tool can optionally output the map to a static PDF map - the map templates have not been fully refined to make outputs that are ready to use, but it can be useful for previewing.

param.name: output_png
param.dialogReference: This tool can optionally output the map to a static PNG image map - the map templates have not been fully refined to make outputs that are ready to use, but it can be useful for previewing.

tool.summary: Generates a map document or ArcGIS Pro map with the requested water quality parameter for a given month included.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Generates a map document or ArcGIS Pro map with the requested water quality parameter for a given month included.
